thread.title: That Viral Video Of A Female Cyclist Getting Revenge On A Catcaller Appears To Have Been Staged
thread.title_full: That Viral Video Of A Female Cyclist Getting Revenge On A Catcaller Appears To Have Been Staged

author: Ikran Dahir Buzzfeed News Reporter
title: That Viral Video Of A Female Cyclist Getting Revenge On A Catcaller Appears To Have Been Staged
text:
Your Post Has Been Launched! Fabulous! Don't forget to share with your friends on Twitter and Facebook. That Viral Video Of A Female Cyclist Getting Revenge On A Catcaller Appears To Have Been Staged BuzzFeed News understands witnesses tried to help the woman but were told it was being filmed. Ikran Dahir BuzzFeed News Reporter 1. Today a video of a female cyclist being harassed by a male passenger in a van has gone viral. 
Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned — DashCamR (@dash_camr) The video shows the man swearing at and abusing the woman, before she decides to get revenge by following the van and ripping off its wing mirror. ID: 10575433 2. However, a witness to the incident who preferred to remain anonymous told BuzzFeed News that his colleagues approached the van to help the woman as they thought she was being abused. View this image › Youtube He said both the men in the van and the cyclist assured his colleagues that they were just filming. He also said it took them at least two takes to make the video. ID: 10576917 3. Reddit users first noticed that the YouTube video was shared by a woman apparently employed by the company that licensed it.
